title: The Fighter (1952 Drama, Sport) Directed by Herbert Kline | Starring Richard Conte

sources.title: The Fighter (1952 Drama, Sport) Directed by Herbert Kline | Starring Richard Conte
sources.description:
Felipe Rivera (Richard Conte) trades knockout blows in the ring to fund his fiery crusade against tyranny, swapping jabs with greed and corruption while rebel leader Durango (Lee J. Cobb) fuels a ringside rebellion where every punch buys a bullet. With blood, sweat, and revolution in the air, Rivera’s fists become Mexico’s deadliest currency—turning a championship bout into a showdown for freedom.

Original title: The Fighter  AKA "The Mexican" by Jack London 

Colorized version https://youtu.be/tOmrY3Lnxq4

Director: Herbert Kline
Writers: Aben Kandel, Herbert Kline, Jack London
Actors: Richard Conte, Vanessa Brown, Lee J. Cobb , Frank Silvera
Genres: Film Noir, Drama, Literary, Sport Boxing
Release Date: May 23, 1952 (USA)
